text: Ra jaba musa(alaihis'salama) aphno jatitira risa ra duhkhako avasthama pharkera a'e ta bhanna thaleh ‘‘timiharule mero anupasthitima sahrai naramro kama garyau. Ke timiharule aphno palanaharako adesabhanda pahila nai hatara garihalyau?’’ Ani chitai patiharu ekatira rakhe ra aphno bha'iko ta'uko samati aphutira ghisarera tannathale. Harunale bhane ki he meri amako chora! Yiniharule mala'i kamajora thanera jhandai maridina cahanthe, tasartha tapa'i satruharubata mamathi upahasa nagara'unus ra mala'i yi atyacariharumadhyeko nathannus
